boat.construction_details: Clincher larch bottom, pine topside on oak joggled frames and keel
boat.full_description: She has undergone a major rebuild in 2004 with new planks to waterline, joggled frames, deck, mast and rudder. New complete sailing rig including mast step, mast, sails and all rigging. Her owner milled all the timber from his own trees, except the plywood for the deck. She's half-decked, with a loose-footed flat-headed sprit set up with snotter, stanliff and brails similar to Thames barges.
boat.name: Bravore
boat.short_description: 'Bravore' is a sprit-rigged double-ender. Originally an inshore fishing vessel, now a coastal cruiser.
